TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed CustomQueryInterfaceResult extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Provides return values for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceResult Failed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The interface for a specific interface ID is not available. In this case, the returned interface is . E_NOINTERFACE is returned to the caller of [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceResult Handled = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The interface pointer that is returned from the method can be used as the result of [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceResult NotHandled = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The custom was not used. Instead, the default implementation of [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) should be used.
